title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper, the perfect deicing tool for your kitchen! Made from a combination of high-quality stainless steel and durable PP material, this tool is built to last. Available in three stylish colors - blue, gray, and pink - there's one to suit every kitchen.

Measuring 17cm in length and 4.5cm in width, this ice scraper is the ideal size for removing frost and ice build-up from your fridge or freezer. Its stainless steel blade is strong and sturdy, ensuring effective deicing, while the PP handle provides a comfortable grip for easy use.

Please note that due to variations in monitors and lighting, the actual color of the product may vary slightly from the images. Additionally, there may be a measurement deviation of 1-5mm. Each package includes one Fridge Ice Scraper.

Upgrade your kitchen toolkit with our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper today and say goodbye to frustrating ice build-up!
